Status

Class CellStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Status.CellStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CellStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Storing the State of the Cell

    The program is used to store the state of each cell in grid.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • CellStatus

        public CellStatus(int n,
                  Player player)
        This constructor is used to initialize the cell state.
        Parameters:
        n - This is the initial number of orbs in the cell.
        player - This is the current owner of the cell.
